trans-unit.source: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en dataflyt som brukes til kommunikasjon med klient-server som bruker SSL (Secure Socket LAYER) sikkerhetsprotokollen til å godkjenne serveren og eventuelt klienten.

trans-unit.source: SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: SSL-protokoller bidrar til konfidensiell og Integritetskontroll for meldinger som er sendt ved hjelp av en SslStream.

trans-unit.source: An SSL connection, such as that provided by SslStream, should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: En SSL-tilkobling, for eksempel som leveres av SslStream, skal brukes ved kommunikasjon sensitiv informasjon mellom en klient og en server.

trans-unit.source: Using an SslStream helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av en SslStream bidrar til å hindre at noen lesing og forfalskning med informasjon som er i transitt på nettverket.

trans-unit.source: An SslStream instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the SslStream.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av SslStream overfører data ved hjelp av en dataflyt som du oppgi ved oppretting av SslStream.

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the SslStream also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne underliggende dataflyten, har du mulighet til å angi om lukking av SslStream lukker underliggende dataflyt også.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the SslStream class is used with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> classes.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SslStream brukes vanligvis med den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>klasser.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method provides a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> suitable for use with the SslStream class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>Metoden gir en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>brukes med SslStream klasse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: After creating an SslStream, the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet en SslStream må serveren og eventuelt klienten godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so.
trans-unit.target: Serveren må angi en X509 sertifikat som oppretter bevis sin identitet og kan be om at klienten også gjøre dette.

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenning må utføres før sending av informasjon ved hjelp av en SslStream.

trans-unit.source: Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: Klienter starte godkjenning ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder som blokkerer før godkjenningen er fullført, eller den asynkrone <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder, som ikke blokker venting for å fullføre godkjenningen.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servere starte godkjenning ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller asynkron <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both client and server must initiate the authentication.
trans-unit.target: Både klienten og serveren må starte godkjenningen.

trans-unit.source: The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningen håndteres av kanalleverandøren Security Support Provider (SSPI).

trans-unit.source: The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate when creating an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: Klienten er angitt en mulighet til å styre validering av serversertifikatet ved å angi en <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>delegere når du oppretter en SslStream.</xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>

trans-unit.source: The server can also control validation by supplying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Serveren kan også kontrollere validering ved å oppgi en <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>delegere.</xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>

trans-unit.source: The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden refererer til representanten inneholder en ekstern krever sertifikatet og eventuelle feil som oppstod under validering av sertifikatet SSPI.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis serveren angir representant, aktiveres i representanten metoden uavhengig av serveren har forespurt for klientgodkjenning.

trans-unit.source: If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis serveren ikke har bedt om klientgodkjenning, mottar serverens representanten metoden et null-sertifikat og en tom matrise med sertifikatfeil.

trans-unit.source: If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Hvis serveren krever klientgodkjenning, må klienten angi én eller flere sertifikater for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a <xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback> delegate to select the correct certificate for the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klienten har mer enn ett sertifikat, klienten kan gi en <xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>representanten velge det riktige sertifikatet for serveren.</xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>

trans-unit.source: The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Den klientsertifikater må ligge i den gjeldende brukeren "Min" sertifikatlageret.

trans-unit.source: Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> (SSL version 2) protocol.
trans-unit.target: Klientgodkjenning via sertifikater støttes ikke for den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>protokollen (SSL versjon 2).</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and the SslStream is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, og SslStream er ikke lenger kunne brukes.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Du må lukke dette objektet, og Fjern alle referanser til den slik at de kan samles av saneringsoppsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the SslStream can be used by the client and server to exchange messages.
trans-unit.target: Når godkjenningsprosessen også kjent som SSL-håndtrykket, lykkes, identiteten til serveren (og eventuelt klienten) er opprettet, og SslStream kan brukes av klienten og serveren til å utveksle meldinger.

trans-unit.source: Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the SslStream to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: Før sending og mottak av informasjon, må klienten og serveren Kontroller sikkerhetstjenester og nivåer som er angitt av SslStream å finne ut om protokollen, algoritmer og sterke valgte oppfyller kravene for integritet og konfidensiell.

trans-unit.source: If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de gjeldende innstillingene ikke er tilstrekkelig, bør dataflyten lukkes.

trans-unit.source: You can check the security services provided by the SslStream using the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere sikkerhet tjenestene SslStream ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser elementer som rapporterer kryptografisk innstillingene som brukes for godkjenning, kryptering og datasignering.

trans-unit.source: |Element|Members| |-------------|-------------| |The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> enumeration.| |The key exchange algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The message integrity algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The message confidentiality algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The strengths of the selected algorithms.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A> properties.| After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: You can receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan motta data ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>eller asynkron <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specified to the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt til den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>at underliggende dataflyt må være åpen, kan du er ansvarlig for å lukke denne dataflyten når du er ferdig med den.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the application that creates the SslStream object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis programmet som oppretter SslStream objektet kjører med legitimasjonen for en vanlig bruker, programmet ikke får tilgang til sertifikater som er installert på den lokale maskinen store Hvis tillatelse eksplisitt er gitt til brukeren til å gjøre dette.

trans-unit.source: SslStream assumes that a timeout along with any other <xref:System.IO.IOException> when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller.
trans-unit.target: SslStream antar at et tidsavbrudd sammen med andre <xref:System.IO.IOException>når en er registrert fra indre dataflyten behandles som uopprettelig den oppkalleren.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: Reusing a SslStream instance after a timeout will return garbage.
trans-unit.target: Bruke en forekomst av SslStream på nytt etter at et tidsavbrudd tilbakestiller ugyldige.

trans-unit.source: An application should <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> the SslStream and throw an exception in these cases.
trans-unit.target: Et program som skal <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>SslStream og throw et unntak i disse tilfellene.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6 inneholder en ny sikkerhetsfunksjon som blokkerer usikker cipher og nummer algoritmer for tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default.
trans-unit.target: Programmer bruker TLS/SSL via API-er for eksempel HttpClient HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, osv. og har .NET Framework 4.6 få sikrere virkemåten som standard.

trans-unit.source: Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan ønsker å delta på dette for å opprettholde samhandling med eksisterende SSL3 tjenestene eller TLS med RC4 services.

trans-unit.source: [This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.
trans-unit.target: [Denne artikkelen](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) forklarer hvordan du endrer koden slik at den nye virkemåten er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6.3 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx).
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6.3 legge legger til nye overlastingene for metodene som godkjennes SslStreams som ikke angir en TLS-versjon, men i stedet bruke TLS-versjonen som er definert som systemstandard i [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app.
trans-unit.target: Bruk disse metodene i appen for å kunne endre senere standarder når TLS versjon beste praksis endres over tid, uten å opprette og distribuere appen på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen for encryptionpolicy, den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>som standard <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>-forekomst som er laget.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av Null-cipher kreves når krypteringspolicyen er satt til <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: innerStream is not readable.
trans-unit.target: innerStreamer ikke lesbar.

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is not writable.
trans-unit.target: - eller - innerStream er ikke skrivbar.

trans-unit.source: innerStream is .
trans-unit.target: innerStreamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is equal to .
trans-unit.target: - eller - innerStream er lik .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>og flyten avslutning virkemåte.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `true` for den `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, lukker den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>har ingen innvirkning på den `innerStream` flyten; du må lukke eksplisitt `innerStream` når du ikke lenger trenger den.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen for encryptionpolicy, den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>som standard <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>-forekomst som er laget.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av Null-cipher kreves når krypteringspolicyen er satt til <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates the closure behavior of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir hvordan avslutning av <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren angir om den indre dataflyten er åpen.

trans-unit.source: innerStream is not readable.
trans-unit.target: innerStreamer ikke lesbar.

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is not writable.
trans-unit.target: - eller - innerStream er ikke skrivbar.

trans-unit.source: innerStream is .
trans-unit.target: innerStreamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is equal to .
trans-unit.target: - eller - innerStream er lik .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>, stream closure behavior and certificate validation delegate.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>flyten avslutning virkemåte og sertifikat validering representant.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `true` for den `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, lukker den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>har ingen innvirkning på den `innerStream` flyten; du må lukke eksplisitt `innerStream` når du ikke lenger trenger den.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: Den `userCertificateValidationCallback` representant `certificateErrors` argumentet inneholder en Windows-feilkoder som ble returnert av kanalen Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av metoden aktiveres av den `userCertificateValidationCallback` representanten bestemmer om vellykket godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsprotokollen og kryptografiske algoritmer er allerede valgt når de `userCertificateValidationCallback` representant metoden aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke metoden til å bestemme om den valgte kryptografiske algoritmer og sterke er tilstrekkelig for programmet.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, metoden skal returnere `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>opprettes.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen for encryptionpolicy, den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>som standard <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>-forekomst som er laget.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av Null-cipher kreves når krypteringspolicyen er satt til <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I Framework bufrer SSL-økter som de opprettes og prøver å bruke en bufret økt til en ny forespørsel om mulig.

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Under forsøk på å bruke en SSL-økt, rammeverket bruker det første elementet i <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>(Hvis det finnes en), eller prøver å bruke en anonym økter Hvis <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>er tom.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Klientsertifikater støttes ikke i versjon 2 SSL-protokollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>, stream closure behavior, certificate validation delegate and certificate selection delegate.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>, flyten avslutning virkemåte, sertifikatet validering representanten og sertifikatet utvalget representant.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `true` for den `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, lukker den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>har ingen innvirkning på den `innerStream` flyten; du må lukke eksplisitt `innerStream` når du ikke lenger trenger den.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: Den `userCertificateValidationCallback` representant `certificateErrors` argumentet inneholder en Windows-feilkoder som ble returnert av kanalen Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av metoden aktiveres av den `userCertificateValidationCallback` representanten bestemmer om vellykket godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsprotokollen og kryptografiske algoritmer er allerede valgt når de `userCertificateValidationCallback` representant metoden aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke metoden til å bestemme om den valgte kryptografiske algoritmer og sterke er tilstrekkelig for programmet.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, metoden skal returnere `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>opprettes.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateSelectionCallback` delegate is useful when your application has multiple certificates and must dynamically choose a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Den `userCertificateSelectionCallback` representanten er nyttig når programmet har flere sertifikater og dynamisk må velge et sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: Certificates in the "MY" store are passed to the method invoked by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikater i "MY" lager er sendt til aktiveres av representanten-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the server and optionally the client in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å godkjenne serveren og eventuelt klienten i en klient servertilkobling.

trans-unit.source: This method authenticates using <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden godkjenner ved hjelp av <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>

trans-unit.source: No client certificates are used in the authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ingen klientsertifikater brukes i godkjenningen.

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikatopphevelseslisten er ikke kontrollert under godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for `targetHost` må samsvare med navnet på serveren sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: Når vellykket godkjenning, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, og dette <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>er ikke lenger kunne brukes.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron leseoperasjon som viser data fra dataflyten og lagrer den i den angitte matrisen.

trans-unit.source: If encryption and or signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and/or decrypts it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kryptering og eller logger er aktivert, leseoperasjonen leser data fra den underliggende dataflyten, kontrollerer integriteten til dataene og/eller dekrypterer den.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron leseoperasjonen må være fullført kaller den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list contains certificates that have been revoked by the issuer.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikatopphevelseslisten inneholder sertifikater som er opphevet av utstederen.

trans-unit.source: Checking the list negatively impacts performance but improves application security.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer listen negativt påvirker ytelse, men forbedrer Programsikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatopphevelseslisten sjekkes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the bulk encryption algorithm used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som identifiserer bulk-krypteringsalgoritmen som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> is required for the CipherAlgorithm property when the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> enumeration value is used to construct a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>kreves for egenskapen CipherAlgorithm når den <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>opplistingsverdien brukes til å lage en <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] do not support the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]og [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] støtter ikke den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>verdi.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: So even if the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value is used to construct the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> property will be <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>.
trans-unit.target: Så selv hvis <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>verdien brukes til å konstruere den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>forekomsten, <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> blir</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value is only returned on Windows Vista and later.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>bare, returneres verdien på Windows Vista og senere.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>verdi.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The CipherAlgorithm property was accessed before the completion of the authentication process or the authentication process failed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CipherAlgorithm ble åpnet før fullføring av godkjenningsprosessen eller godkjenningsprosessen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the strength of the cipher algorithm used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som identifiserer styrken til Chifferalgoritmer brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is zero until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er null til godkjenningen.

trans-unit.source: This property returns one of the following values: - 0 - 40 - 56 - 80 - 128 - 168 - 192 - 256
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer en av følgende verdier: - 0 - 40-56-80-128-168 192 - 256

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the strength of the algorithm, in bits.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir styrken til algoritmen, i biter.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>referanser.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous server authentication operation started with a previous call to <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>.
trans-unit.target: Slutter en ventende asynkron server-godkjenning operasjon i gang med en tidligere kall til <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen ikke er fullført, som denne metoden før det gjøres.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: Når godkjenningen lykkes, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, og dette <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>er ikke lenger kunne brukes.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.target: Du må lukke dette objektet, og Fjern alle referanser til den slik at de kan samles av saneringsoppsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm used for generating message authentication codes (MACs).
trans-unit.target: Henter algoritmen som brukes ved generering godkjenningskoder (MACs) for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Message authentication algorithms generate message hashes and signatures used to detect tampering and forgery.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen godkjenningsalgoritmer generere meldingen numre og signaturer som brukes til å oppdage forfalskning og forfalskning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType>verdi.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The HashAlgorithm property was accessed before the completion of the authentication process or the authentication process failed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nummeralgoritme ble åpnet før fullføring av godkjenningsprosessen eller godkjenningsprosessen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the strength of the hash algorithm used by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som identifiserer styrken til hash-algoritmen som brukes i denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are 128 or 160.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier er 128 eller 160.

trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om godkjenningen var vellykket.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Clients authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenn klienter ved å ringe det <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servere Godkjenn ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det oppstod en vellykket godkjenning; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> bruker datakryptering.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data, namely it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering bidrar til å beskytte personvernet for dataene, som bidrar den til å sikre at dataene er i transitt, den ikke kan tydes av tredjeparter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data er kryptert før overføres via nettverket og dekrypteres når den når det eksterne endepunktet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om både serveren og klientprogrammene er godkjent.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the server when the server wants the client to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Gjensidig godkjenning er angitt av serveren når serveren ønsker klienten til å angi et sertifikat for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serveren har godkjent; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den lokale siden av tilkoblingen brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> ble godkjent som serveren.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenning kan ikke eller denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne som serveren, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det lokale sluttpunktet ble godkjent som serversiden av godkjente tilkoblingen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dataene som sendes ved hjelp av denne dataflyten er signert.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data, namely it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Data logger bidrar til å beskytte dataene, som hjelper mottakeren bestemme om dataene har blitt endret i transitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene er signert før overføres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key exchange algorithm used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>til godkjenningen.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The key exchange algorithm protects information used to generate shared keys.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen nøkkelutvekslingen beskytter informasjon som brukes til å generere delte nøkler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>verdi.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the strength of the key exchange algorithm used by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som identifiserer styrken til nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen som brukes i denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is zero until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er null til godkjenningen.

trans-unit.source: In common scenarios, the value of this property is one of the following: - 512 - 768 - 1024 - 2048
trans-unit.target: Vanlige scenarier verdien for denne egenskapen er én av følgende: - 512 768-1024 2048

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the strength of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> algorithm, in bits.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir styrken til den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>algoritmen i biter.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Reads data from this stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Leser data fra denne dataflyten og lagrer den i den angitte matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden leser maksimalt `count` byte fra dataflyten og lagrer dem i `buffer` Start fra `offset`.

trans-unit.source: You cannot perform multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke utføre flere samtidige leseoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid en skriveoperasjon blokkerer venter data.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som returneres ved å bruke <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>for underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien angir for å angi operasjoner i <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>verdien for den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not timeout.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det underliggende er en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout i millisekunder og er <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>som standard slik som skrive operasjoner vil ikke tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that elapses before a synchronous write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir hvor lang tid det skal gå før en synkron skriving operasjonen mislykkes.</xref:System.Int32>
